pageContent: Introduction: Quality of life (QL) assessment should be an essential part of clinical practice and should also be included in every clinical trial of prostate cancer. The term QL describes a person's overall well-being comprising not only physical functioning but also psychological and social dimensions. It is important to remember that QL can be affected by the disease as well as by the therapeutic treatment adopted.

metaData.source:
A descriptive study of functions, symptoms, and perceived health state after radiotherapy for prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21920818/
